name: Whispers in the West
storyline:
A series of gruesome crimes have shaken the Wild West - eluding even the most expert investigators. As the townsfolk grow scared at the thought of an assassin hiding among them, it’ll be up to you to connect the dots and finally bring it all together. Explore your surroundings, talk to the villagers, gather evidence, and find clues to support your theory as you quickly realize nobody around you is above suspicion.

Each story is a unique and intriguing mystery waiting to be solved. To succeed, the players can either work solo or work as a team and debate amongst themselves - things may get heated.
summary: Untangle thrilling mysteries by exploring the merciless and lawless Wild Western town of Brimstone. You and your friends need to collaborate, interrogate the town's residents and piece the clues together to solve the mystery!
